questions: What are the expected properties for processing a payment?
What type of data is expected for the "credit_card.cvv" property?
What is an example of a valid "order_id" property?
answer:
## Expected properties.
!!! Tip

    All properties are optional. If any property is missing it will not be processed and no error will be reported.

| Name                | Expected type   | Example                                                                  |
|---------------------|-----------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| credit_card.cvv     |                 | 123    |
| order_id            | string          | "12345-abcde-67890"            |
| credit_card.expires | string          |    "02/24" |
| method              | string          | "credit_card"             |
| credit_card.holder  | string          | "John Doe" |
| credit_card.number  | string          | "4111-1111-1111-1111"  |
